'''Scholar''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] and [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Clear Pool and Mountain Cavern]] and [[Adventure Rank]] [[Adventure Rank/Adventurers' Guild Rewards|Rewards]] (29, 31, 32, 34, 36).

==Gameplay Notes==
*4-Piece Bonus:
**The character with the Scholar Artifact Set equipped must be on field to activate the 4-Piece Bonus.
**The 4-Piece Bonus is '''not affected''' by Energy Recharge.
**The 4-Piece Bonus '''cannot be triggered''' by off field energy particles or orbs.
**The 4-Piece Bonus '''cannot be triggered''' by other forms of energy replenishment from [[The Exile|The Exile Set]] or another The Scholar Set but '''can be triggered''' by Elemental Particles produced by the [[Favonius Series]]' weapon passive.
**The 4-Piece Bonus can only activate once every 3 seconds.
*A 2{{Star}} Scholar's Clock can be obtained by speaking to [[Timaeus]].
